containing_words.word: 大学入学指定科目考试

definition: agrégation (exam for teaching diploma in French universities)

definition: to screen/to grade by examination/screening/placement test
see 考試卷|考试卷[kao3 shi4 juan4]

sentences.english: The way one studies for tests is very important.
Exam, only write the pen of the broken broken voice and more or less beating.
sentences.chinese: 考试中，只有写字笔的碎碎声音和或多或少的心跳声。

sentences.english: Nana pulled an all-nighter to study for her math exam.
sentences.chinese: 为了应付数学考试，娜娜学了一个通宵。

sentences.english: Testing plays an important part in university's teaching and quality administration.
sentences.chinese: 考试是高等学校教学管理和质量管理的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: Could you describe one of your hardest exams?
sentences.chinese: 你能说说你一门最难的考试吗？

sentences.english: I will take an end-of-term exam this Friday.
sentences.chinese: 这周五我要进行期末考试。

sentences.english: Here are some sample questions for last year's exam.
sentences.chinese: 这是去年考试中的一些样题。

sentences.english: I burnt some joss papers and pray to the examination god.
sentences.chinese: 我烧了一些金纸，祈求上帝的考试。

sentences.english: I was level with my friend in the examination；we got the same number of marks.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友考试成绩一样，我们所得分数相同。

sentences.english: Let's say that your test at school is happening the next day.
sentences.chinese: 假设第二天学校就要考试了。

sentences.english: All you have to do is get an A on the next test, and then you can pass Math!
sentences.chinese: 你只要在下一次考试拿A就行啦，你的数学就能过了。

sentences.english: English is my last one examination to get a good feeling.
sentences.chinese: 英语是我的最后一门考试，感觉考得还不错。

sentences.english: He failed in the end-of-term exam.
MHK is the shortened form of the Chinese Proficiency Test for Minorities in China.
sentences.chinese: MHK是中国少数民族汉语水平等级考试的简称。

sentences.english: I had done a better job in the final examination!
sentences.chinese: 我多么希望在期末考试时考出好成绩。

sentences.english: Participated in the Collge English Test Band Four and Six, and achieved excellent scores.
sentences.chinese: 参加英语四六级考试，并取得优异成绩。

definition: to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam

exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
entrance exam for senior middle school
